BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-VolumeDistanceCommand
BundleInfo.Author: Vivian Li
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Calculate the shortest distance between distinct sections of two volumes.
BundleInfo.Description: This command calculates the shortest distance between distinct sections of two volumes. This is useful for determining the distances between elements of two segmentation volumes to view statistically, for example, to produce a histogram of the shortest distance between nuclear pores and nearby mitochondria.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: volume distance :: Structure Analysis :: Calculate distances between distinct sections of two volumes
